metadata.title: Tuesday, 15th March, 2022
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to expand the Great North Road between 6 Miles and 15 Miles in Katuba Parliamentary Constituency to reduce traffic congestion on the stretch of the Road; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct township roads in the following townships in Mpika Parliamentary Constituency:
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) when the construction of the Great North Road - TAZARA road will be completed; and
(d) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is.
(a) why the construction of the maternity ward at Mushindamo Clinic in Mushindamo District has stalled;
(c) what the total cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct police posts in the following chiefdoms in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency:
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands and Natural Resources
parts: (a) whether the land owned by Palabana University, between the University and Mikango road, in Chongwe District has been sold;
(b) if not, why private developers have taken over and are developing the land; and
(c) what measures the Government is taking to address the situation.
